page.title: 01DESCRIPTION - ELMBRIDGE AREA
page.content: Very rural area covering the hamlets of Elmbridge Cooksey Green and part of Cutnall Green village. Land Cover- arable,pasture or grazing. Church and Village Hall at Elmbridge, Village Hall with sports field at Cutnall Green. There are no schools,shops,resturants,pubs or petrol stations in this block but are nearby. Bus service only on A442 own transport very important. Many households have two cars only three have none. Majority of roads extremly narrow bordered with hedges with a gated road at Manor Farm. One garden centre and shrub nursery and an apple orchard. Area all farmland providing the only industry therefore others self-employed at home or commute to work. Housing is expensive and much sort after,therefore there are few young families and many retired people
